head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINER, ROSLYN A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINER, ROSLYN A.

block.p: WEINER-Roslyn A., 75. Of Aventura, Florida. formerly of NY passed away Friday, May 1, 1998. Beloved wife of Dr. Irwin, loving mother of Dr. Jonathan of Fresno, CA., Dr. Michael S. of Sanger, CA., Peter of Miami, FL., cherished grandmother of seven. Services and interment in Florida. For information Levitt-Weinstein Mem. Chapels, 18840 W. Dixie Highway, North Miami Beach, Florida.
